arm_group.description: RGC containing the equivalent of 50 mg resveratrol
RGC containing the equivalent of 150 mg resveratrol

brief_summary.textblock:
This study was designed to assess the pharmacokinetics of 2 doses of Red Grape Cells (RGC)
      containing resveratrol compared with a reference. RGC will be administered as single oral
      dose to fasting healthy volunteers. Plasma concentration of free resveratrol and total
      conjugates will be analyzed.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Ages 18-55 years;

          -  BMI >/= 19 and </= 30

          -  non smoking

          -  without history or evidence of significant cardiovascular, hepatic, renal,
             respiratory, gastrointestinal disease

          -  normal physical and laboratory examinations

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  History or evidence of alcohol or drug abuse

          -  subjects receiving chronic medication

          -  unusual dietary habits or a recent change in body weight

          -  acute medical situation 48 hours prior to initiation of the study

          -  poor venous access

          -  Subjects participated in a trial or donated blood within 4 weeks before initiation of
             the study

clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Three-way Cross-over Comparative Pharmacokinetic Study of Resveratrol Comprising Products in Fasting Healthy Subjects

primary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetic data such as the peak plasma concentration (Cmax), time to peak (Tmax) ans area under the concentration-time curves (AUCt) will be reported.
primary_outcome.measure: Individual plasma concentrations of free and conjugated resveratrol

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Bio-availability Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)
